channel.title: How to shake SYI(Ddoser) off of your server!
channel.description:
Ok I am here to tell what i have been working on for the past 2 or 3 days....i have coded and coded but the easiest solution came upon me last night and i tried and it worked!!! here is what u need to do: Note: please post any problems or errors to me i will try to fix.
1.Have a normal non-edited version of mopar opened. 2.open your server 3.run them both 4.go to server status page and advertise the mopar IP make it a fake one and beside it do this[code]FakeserverIPhere.no-ip.info guy go to this on realserveriphere.no-ip.info[/code] Fill in the fake and real with yours.... 5.once advertised watch both runserver and make sure Syi gets on Normal Mopar and Place this in Both Mopar and Your Server's Client.Java and Server.Java [code]ifplayernameis=or-to-SYI-then disconnected=True;[/code] Note:remember you must place that in both Server.java and Cleint.Javavs under Code: playerhandler 6. run your server and Un-edited Mopar at the same time 7.once you have done the step above^ Let ppl on your edited source make sure no one gets on mopar. 8.when SYI invades un-edited mopar You must then Shut down that and bring it back up after he has logged on once go to his character file and where it says Char Pos. place this:[code]-1 -1[/code] He then will try and log in again but this time it will kick him off of mopar bc he has invalid Coordinates. 9. After that you should be able to play your server with a small bit of lag coming from the other runserver.bat but at least you can play on it and ppl can play on it!
Thanks for reading and i hope it Stops him....maybe someone can find a way to stop him without opening un-edited Mopar. As for me i will be looking for more ways to Stop him lol.
Code if he logs onto your server: [code]Ifclientandorplayer = Disconnected=true;[/code] Put that in Client.Java Under the first Player search. Thanks and Enjoy :cool:

item.title: How to shake SYI(Ddoser) off of your server!
item.dc:creator: @dark_sounds dark sounds
item.description:
@dark_sounds wrote:

bakatool:

rofl u sure he uses unedited mopar?

actually u open unedited mopar b4 u run your server and he will connect to that not your server…and as for him connecting to your change your port…

There is already a way easier way posted, why would you want to run 2 servers? doesn’t he use illegal characters to lag the hell out of you? just block the illegal characters.

No he will try to connect to your server but cant, he then will be disconnected from unedited mopar and not be able to connect i am looking for a way to do this without opening 2 servers…

Read full topic

item.title: How to shake SYI(Ddoser) off of your server!
item.dc:creator: @dark_sounds dark sounds
item.description:
@dark_sounds wrote:

Ok I am here to tell what i have been working on for the past 2 or 3 days…i have coded and coded but the easiest solution came upon me last night and i tried and it worked!!! here is what u need to do: Note: please post any problems or errors to me i will try to fix.

1.Have a normal non-edited version of mopar opened.
2.open your server
3.run them both
4.go to server status page and advertise the mopar IP make it a fake one and beside it do thisFakeserverIPhere.no-ip.info guy go to this on realserveriphere.no-ip.info
Fill in the fake and real with yours…
5.once advertised watch both runserver and make sure Syi gets on Normal Mopar and Place this in Both Mopar and Your Server’s Client.Java and Server.Java

ifplayernameis=or-to-SYI-then disconnected=True;

Note:remember you must place that in both Server.java and Cleint.Javavs under Code: playerhandler
6. run your server and Un-edited Mopar at the same time
7.once you have done the step above^ Let ppl on your edited source make sure no one gets on mopar.
8.when SYI invades un-edited mopar You must then Shut down that and bring it back up
after he has logged on once go to his character file and where it says Char Pos. place this:-1 -1
He then will try and log in again but this time it will kick him off of mopar bc he has invalid Coordinates.
9. After that you should be able to play your server with a small bit of lag coming from the other runserver.bat but at least you can play on it and ppl can play on it!

Thanks for reading and i hope it Stops him…maybe someone can find a way to stop him without opening un-edited Mopar. As for me i will be looking for more ways to Stop him lol.

Code if he logs onto your server:

Ifclientandorplayer = Disconnected=true;

Put that in Client.Java Under the first Player search. Thanks and Enjoy
